survey_name: Parental Satisfaction with K-12 Online Learning Platforms
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess parent satisfaction with the online learning platforms used by K-12 students, including ease of use, educational effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall usability of your child's online learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure options are evenly balanced.
